HEADLINE: Transcript of interaction with Analysts/Institutional Investors/Funds - Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations')

In compliance with Regulation 30(6) read with Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Company on Tuesday, August 02, 2022, concluded its earnings conference call with several Analysts/Institutional Investors/Funds on the Financial Results.

The Analysts/Institutional Investors/Funds were briefed on the published Financial Results, the general industry and business overview of the Company. ....
